body.p: A container used to display a set of tabbed pages of elements. A row of tabs is displayed at the top of tabbox which may be used to switch between each page. The tabbox should contain two children, the first a template.XULElem("tabs") element which contains the tabs and the second a template.XULElem("tabpanels") element which contains the contents of the pages.
More information is available in the XUL tutorial.
